1.2.name: wordpress/oldest-2-newest-redux
1.2.description: Take the oldest post and make it the newest post if there has not been a new post in 24 hours, thereby changing the order on home page and other lists. The number of hours may be adjusted with a simple edit. This should only be activated after you have multiple posts on the website. Updated for wordpress 2.7. Original at Rich Hamilton Original Oldest2Newest
